pages.title: Recycler
pages.text: The $(l)Recycler$() is a custom enchantment that can be applied to mining tools, most notably the $(l:logicore:components/cycle_pick)Cycle Pickaxe$().$(br)$(br)When a block with an assigned $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycle Value$() is mined, it is instantly converted into Cycles and added to your cloud storage instead of dropping as an item.

pages.title: Usage & Mechanics
pages.text: The Recycler respects $(l)Fortune$() and $(l)Looting$() enchantments, increasing the cycle yield accordingly.$(br)$(br)If you wish to obtain the block itself, hold $(l)Shift$() while mining to bypass the recycling process.

pages.title: Recycler Blacklist
pages.text: Some blocks are protected from the Recycler to prevent accidental destruction of critical infrastructure. This is managed via the $(l)logicore:recycler_blacklist$() block tag.$(br)$(br)By default, all LogiCore machines and components are blacklisted.
